statements: SELECT * FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors WHERE product_code = 'ABC123';
SELECT product_name, in_stock_qty FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'Vendor A' AND ship_to_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors WHERE in_stock_qty > 100;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name, in_stock_qty FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'Vendor%';
SELECT vendor_name, product_name FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors;
SELECT product_name, in_stock_qty, ship_to_location FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors WHERE in_stock_qty > 0 ORDER BY in_stock_qty DESC;
SELECT * FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT vendor_id) AS num_vendors, AVG(in_stock_qty) AS avg_stock FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name, product_code FROM 5G_Equipment_Vendors WHERE product_code IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name, vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT product_name, vendor_name, price FROM equipment;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE destination_location = 'New York';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE equipment_id = 123;
SELECT product_name, price FROM equipment WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE vendor_name = 'VendorABC';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT e.product_name, s.destination_location FROM equipment e JOIN shipments s ON e.equipment_id = s.equipment_id;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM equipment;
SELECT * FROM equipment_vendor_inventory;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM equipment_vendor_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name FROM equipment_vendor_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT shipment_id, destination, shipping_date FROM shipment_tracking ORDER BY shipping_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_info WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_vendor_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM equipment_vendor_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendor_info WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT shipment_id, destination, shipping_date FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipping_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM equipment_vendor_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%monitor%' AND location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE product_quantity > 50;
SELECT shipments.shipment_id, shipments.shipment_date, products.product_name FROM shipments INNER JOIN products ON shipments.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY shipments.shipment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM products WHERE vendor_id = 3 ORDER BY product_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY destination_location ASC;
SELECT locations.location_name, shipments.shipment_id FROM locations INNER JOIN shipments ON locations.location_id = shipments.destination_location;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_name FROM vendors WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT shipment_id, destination, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT * FROM products WHERE vendor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL
